title: Scourge.Outbreak.Repack-R.G.Mechanics

Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, AMD Athlon X2, or equivalent, running at 1.86 GHz or greater
Memory: 2 GB
Video: 256 MB compatible with DirectX 9

Description:

2026 comes, and the world is ruled from behind the scenes power-hungry 
corporation "Nogaro", the developer of a new powerful source of energy 
called "Ambrosia". Unknown population globe Ambrosia - fruit research 
mysterious meteorite fragment, which owns "Nogaro". To save it, it will 
go on anything. Challenge corporation "Nogaro" dares only one 
organization - Initiative "Tarn", an anonymous group of saboteurs - opponents 
corporations intending to reveal the truth about Ambrosia and break the 
iron grip, which "Nogaro" keeps the world. In the game "Scourge: Outbreak" 
you lead a detachment of "Echo" - an elite group of mercenaries whose 
initiative "Tarn" requested inflict a decisive blow corporation "Nogaro". 
Other orders initiatives "Tarn" entrusted with distracting attack, 
and the detachment "Echo" is worth the most important task: first, 
to find and rescue Dr. Reysbeka, double agent "Tarn" Corporation 
"Nogaro"; second, to grab a piece of the meteorite that is stored 
in the depths of laboratories "Nogaro". Powerful arsenal of weapons 
and special abilities to help crush all obstacles on your way to finding 
the truth about the terrible fuel technology "Ambrosia" corporation 
"Nogaro". Campaign mode of interaction with support for up to 4 players 
and with full support for connecting and disconnecting the players during 
the game. Through memories that only sees your character and find out how 
they are consistent with what they see your friends! The whole experience 
and all gaming skills obtained in Campania, you remain in the multiplayer 
modes for 8 players. Gameplay Scourge: Outbreak mode mortal combat, mortal 
combat command and capture the flag is very fleeting, and will stand in good 
stead fast reflexes, sensitive fingers and constant motion! You wait 5 
shrouded death maps for multiplayer games in which you will be able to 
continue the slaughter group "Echo" with security "Nogaro" 
for supremacy on the island Nogaro!

Guide for online play

c replacement along the way ... "game folder"  Binaries  Win32
2) We start Steam or Greenluma and enter your account.
3) Start the game. 

In game:

Connection:

Multiplayer -> joint campaign -> Join game
Multiplayer:
Multiplayer -> Quick Game -> Select the mode and are looking for players 

Or just accept the invitation to the server 

Create the server:

CO-OP:

Multiplayer -> joint campaign -> New Game -> Waiting for players 
or invite friends via Shift + Tab

Multiplayer:

Multiplayer -> Quick Play -> Choose Mode -> Undo selection group -> 
invite all friends -> group selection starts again
